meanings.definition: To change the size of something.
meanings.sent1: I need to resize this photo to fit it in the frame.
meanings.sent2: She used the computer program to resize the image for the presentation.
meanings.sent3: Trying to resize a mountain to fit in a backpack would be quite a challenge!
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening seemed to resize the small balcony into a lush oasis.
meanings.sent5: The tailor skillfully resized the dress to perfectly fit the customer.
